body_html:
Hi
I tried the above code but got the message:

"AttributeError: module 'tensorflow' has no attribute 'RunConfig'"

I then tried:

config = tf.estimator.RunConfig(tf_random_seed=234)

but this also failed. Finally I tried:

config = tf.contrib.learn.RunConfig(tf_random_seed=234)

This works! Is using contrib.learn the best way to set the random seed?

Thanks

body:
Hi
I tried the above code but got the message:

"AttributeError: module 'tensorflow' has no attribute 'RunConfig'"

I then tried:

 config = tf.estimator.RunConfig(tf_random_seed=234)

but this also failed. Finally I tried:

config = tf.contrib.learn.RunConfig(tf_random_seed=234)

This works! Is using contrib.learn the best way to set the random seed?

Thanks
